title: Mathematics Education Design Based on the ATHENA Competency Model for Creativity and Complex Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced mathematical concepts comprehension and 5+ years of professional career experience
context.additional_context: Constructed around hands-on environments using digital devices, collaborative learning, and case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can establish creative problem-solving strategies by utilizing the five dimensions (cognitive, motivational, knowledge-based, emotional, sensorimotor) of the ATHENA model
Learners can analyze mathematical problems from multidimensional perspectives and apply 15 or more of the 60 sub-competencies to real-world cases
Learners can interpret competency diagnostic results through peer assessment and design personalized learning roadmaps
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
